title: Pixel 2XL LTE become useless after updated to Android 10
content: My carrier support LTE as previously i used huawei phone.the signal were excellent.now after swapping to pixel 2xl the updated to Android 10 the LTE are basically useless.i've got full bar but there is small x inside the Lte icon as attached from the picture.is there a bug on the android 10 or does my unit is defect?can somebody help me out.I had to revert to H+ since its working well so far but whats the point having pixel but the line is slow?
